The voltage level of substation is 220 kV Voltage level of OJWEPL PSS is 220kV, OJWEPL GSS is 400kV and ORPPL GSS is 132kV. the voltage level of all the PSS & GSS for each project (as applicable) are not specifically mentioned in the validated PD. The same is _ corrected appropriately in the MR as per actual site condition. The voltage levels mentioned in the MR of the substations are verified during site visit and found to be correct.
